body:
Thank you to everyone who has been with me during my Avicus journey, its been truly amazing. You know who ya are <3

I will still be around, but not too much. I will try attend scrims if I can.

Proud holder of the most monuments broken on the server (6000!) and most server joins (over 10000!)

If you wish to keep in touch, add me on snapchat: marcsnaps100 (please state your username when doing so)

I wish you all the best in life to those I may not see, and I hope it all works out for you.

Been staff twice, although demoted, still had an amazing time and learnt new skills!

Apologies to anyone I was toxic too, and a thank you to those who hackusated me XD

Seriously though, it was one amazing wild ride I am glad I stayed on til the end. I won't forget them at all! Thank you <3

title: A massive thank you from me (MarcuzFire)
